item.title: Sarah add a quote by Carl Gustav Jung
item.description: "The creation of something new is not accomplished by the intellect but by the play instinct acting from inner necessity. The creative mind plays with the objects it loves. " -- Carl Gustav Jung

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Walt Whitman
item.description: "Do I contradict myself? Very well, then, I contradict myself; I am large -- I contain multitudes." -- Walt Whitman

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Walt Whitman
item.description: "Long enough have you dream'd contemptible dreams, Now I wash the gum from your eyes, You must habit yourself to the dazzle of the light and of every moment of your life" -- Walt Whitman

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Reality is merely an illusion, albeit a very persistent one." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Max Ernst
item.description: "Before he goes into the water, a diver cannot know what he will bring back." -- Max Ernst

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Carl Gustav Jung
item.description: "One does not become enlightened by imagining figures of light, but by making the darkness conscious." -- Carl Gustav Jung

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Alice Neel
item.description: "Whether I'm painting or not, I have this overweening interest in humanity. Even if I'm not working, I'm still analyzing people." -- Alice Neel

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Helen Fielding
item.description: "Oh God. valentine's Day tomorrow. Why? Why? Why is (the) entire world geared to make people not involved in romance feel stupid when everyone knows romance does not work anyway. Look at (the) royal family. Look at Mum and Dad." -- Helen Fielding
